::KitKat::
"For now, I am unsure of what will happen. I know that the maximals 
are our enemies. But Destructor strongly feels the need to help them. 
SO, I shall go alone.  They may prove usefull. For instance, we might 
get them to assist us in tracking and killing Megatron. But for now, 
we shall play along."


::Battera::
She looked at Vulois, now very nervous.  He didn't know her or 
remember the past that they shared.  "You came here following me? 
Don't you remember?  We both serve the allience. I am your superior, 
well, kind of. Look, I left the base, then you followed me herer for 
answers on your past."  She looked at him,"Please....please put the 
gun down."




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Starscream
> 
> "Thank You KitKat. I shall treasure this honour." He liked the ring 
> of his new title: War General Starscream. It wasn't as good as 
> Emperor, but it was good. He was about to leave, when KitKat asked 
> him a question.
> 
> "Temporal Rift? I've never heard of it here, but it could be 
> possible. Do you mean Phobia is alive? But why would you want to 
> bring him back? Wasn't he a trator?"
> 
> Starscream also pondered a messages she got from Destructor.
> 
> "Why would we want the Maximals as allies? It wasn't all Maximals 
who 
> put us in this predicament. It was the Maximals fault too. I 
thought 
> we were going to destroy them when we defeated Megatron?"
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Vulois
> 
> Vulois again looked puzzled.
> 
> "Mind what? What arew you talking about? I am Vulois, Alliance 
> Warrior. Always have been, always will be. Again, why have you 
> brought me here?"
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Trainers
> 
> Tamron and Savage went ut of range of the Maximals. They seperated 
> and watched the battle in cloak.
> 
> "Sir, what about Slayer?"
> 
> "He's a warrior. He loves to fight. He will come eventually. Leave 
> him for now. He's winning. But our job is to wait until they 
contact 
> the other Maximal base, and we can track it down. That is where 
> Spears will be."
> 
> They waited for the transmission. All except for Ignatius, who was 
> working on a quicker way.........
